input.sentences: they decided to go to their favorite local cafe .
[male] is so excited that he is taking selfies .
everyone else in the group is gathered around a cozy couch .
the boys are having a deep conversation about sports .

output.sentences: Cafe Abir is a local favorite.
People come to spend time with their friends.
And gather on the couch while having some drinks.
The room is small and fairly noisy, so stand close when you're talking.
All in all, it's a great place for a relaxing night out.
